descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]Cerridwen does not know much about her past... She does know she was brought to the honorhall orphanage when she was very young and its where she has spent most of her life. Cerridwen now does not live in the orphanage anymore but has joined the thieves guild.Cerridwen yearns to leave Riften to go and adventure and is willing to follow anyone will is willing to take her. (there is my horrible backstory Enjoy!)[img]http://i.imgur.com/FFyvErh.png[/img]Name: Cerridwen Age: 19Location: The Bee and barb Riften Class: Mage She levels up with the playerYou are able to marry her She Primarily uses lightning magicComes with the light foot perk so she won't trigger traps[color=#d9ead3][size=5]
[/size][/color][color=#d9ead3][size=5]Permissions/credits[/size][/color][color=#d9ead3][size=5]
